MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH45 postcode areas of Eddleston and Peebles. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:48pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:41 PM on Sunday, 04 April 2021.
